Text: Rebirth of Mothra (モスラ , Mosura , released in Japan simply as Mothra) is a 1996 Japanese tokusatsu kaiju film featuring Mothra, produced and distributed by Toho.

Text: Rebirth of Mothra:  The film is directed by Okihiro Yoneda and serves as a reboot of the "Mothra" film series and is the first installment in the "Rebirth of Mothra" trilogy.
